statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE role = 'user';

SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND last_login < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username IN ('alice', 'bob', 'charlie');
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email NOT LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM users;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT role) FROM users;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE last_login IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT user_id, MAX(last_login) AS latest_login FROM users;
SELECT MIN(user_id) AS smallest_id, MAX(user_id) AS largest_id FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' AND last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY last_login DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE last_login IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_admins FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT MAX(last_login) AS latest_login FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE last_login BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), last_login)) AS avg_days_since_login FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND (username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%example.com');
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' AND password LIKE '%pass%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND email REGEXP '^[a-z0-9._%+-]+@[a-z0-9.-]+\.[a-z]{2,4}$';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT role) AS num_roles FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE last_login < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY);
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'user' AND (last_login > '2022-01-01' OR email LIKE '%yahoo.com');
SELECT MIN(user_id) AS smallest_id, MAX(user_id) AS largest_id FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email NOT LIKE '%yahoo.com';
SELECT AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id FROM users;
SELECT role, COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM users GROUP BY role HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT users.user_id, users.username, user_roles.role_name, user_roles.role_description FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_role = user_roles.role_name;

SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name ORDER BY r.role_name DESC, u.username ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name WHERE u.user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name WHERE u.username = 'John' UNION SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name WHERE u.username = 'Jane';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name WHERE u.username = 'John' INTERSECT SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_role = r.role_name WHERE u.username = 'Jane';

SELECT u.username, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS role_count FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.role IN ('admin', 'editor');
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id HAVING COUNT(r.role_name) > 1;
SELECT u.username AS user, COUNT(ur.role_id) AS role_count FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING role_count > 2;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id UNION SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(r.role_name) AS role_count FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY role_count DESC;

SELECT u.username AS user, r.role_name AS role FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(r.role_name) > 1;

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT role_name, permission_name FROM roles JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username AS user_name, r.role_name AS role, p.permission_name AS permission FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, CONCAT(u.username, ' has role ', r.role_name) AS user_role FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id INNER JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.username = 'admin';

SELECT permission_name, COUNT(*) AS total_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY permission_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id WHERE ur.role_id IS NULL;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_permissions FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id GROUP BY u.username HAVING COUNT(*) > 0;
SELECT permission_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM permissions p LEFT JOIN roles r ON p.permission_id = r.role_id GROUP BY permission_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 0;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id GROUP BY u.username, r.role_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 0;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.id = 1;

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM roles;
SELECT username, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM users GROUP BY username HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1);
SELECT username, COUNT(DISTINCT role_id) AS role_count FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE users.user_id = user_roles.user_id);
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE users.user_id = user_roles.user_id);
SELECT user_id, AVG(role_id) AS avg_role_id FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT role_id, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY role_id ORDER BY user_count DESC;

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id ORDER BY username ASC, role_name ASC, permission_name DESC;

SELECT username, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id, permission_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 1 AND permission_id = 1;

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1) AND permission_id IN (SELECT permission_id FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 1);

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1) AND permission_id IN (SELECT permission_id FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1));
